channel.title: Wow

item.title: Wow
item.dc:creator: @Pzezima2 Pzezima2
item.description:
@Pzezima2 wrote:

I made a new NPC on my PI server. Here is my EntityDef.java code.

if(i == 5000) { stream.currentOffset = streamIndices[630]; entityDef.aByte68 = 3; entityDef.readValues(stream); // Collect original NPC data entityDef.name = "Tuco"; entityDef.description = "That's one drug fucked Mexican".getBytes(); entityDef.combatLevel = 138; entityDef.actions = new String[5]; entityDef.actions[1] = "Talk to"; entityDef.anIntArray94 = new int[10]; entityDef.anIntArray94[0] = 1052;//Npc's Cape entityDef.anIntArray94[1] = 1050;//Npc's Head entityDef.anIntArray94[2] = 1127;//Npc's Plate entityDef.anIntArray94[3] = 1079;//Npc's Legs entityDef.anIntArray94[4] = 1305;//Npc's Weapon entityDef.anIntArray94[5] = 1495;//Npc's Gloves entityDef.anIntArray94[6] = 1062;//Npc's Boots entityDef.anIntArray94[7] = 17461;//Npc's Shadow entityDef.anIntArray94[8] = 20147;//Npc's Arms (don't edit) entityDef.anIntArray94[9] = 40939;//Npc's Off hand //entityDef.walkAnim = 1146; //entityDef.standAnim = 6; }

Why is it so messed up?

Read full topic
